text.author: Supreme Court of Ohio
text.summary: Attorney Eric Levi, representing appellant Darnell Hurt before Chief Justice Kennedy and the Court, argues that his client, charged for felonious assault and felony murder, should not be retried, since a prior jury already applied a provocation mitigator for voluntary manslaughter to him, and therefore effectively acquitted him of being prosecuted based on 'double jeopardy'.
text.title: Supreme Court of Ohio - Case No. 2022-1037 State v. Hurt
